meanings.english_definition: to roll up into a ball; to make spherical

examples.translation: To crumple a sheet of paper into a ball.
examples.english_translation: To roll a sheet of paper into a ball.

examples.sentence: Appallottolare la pasta per fare le polpette.
examples.translation: To roll the dough to make meatballs.
examples.english_translation: To roll the dough to make meatballs.

collocations: appallottolare un foglio (to roll up a sheet)
appallottolare la carta (to crumple the paper)

usage_notes.explanation: Appallottolare significa ridurre qualcosa in forma di palla, spesso arrotolando o accartocciando.

example_sentences.sentence: Ha appallottolato il fazzoletto tra le mani.
example_sentences.translation: She balled up the handkerchief in her hands.
